about_the_game:
Lode King Industries is a Canadian trailer manufacturer that produces extremely popular and reliable vehicles. Since its founding, the company has become one of the most important manufacturers of commercial highway transport trailers. The company has also expanded its production to the states, where they've established as the brand Prestige with which they offer their amazing products specially adjusted for the US market and customers.

We are happy to introduce a total of 15 highly detailed trailer models and compatible accessories, available in a wide variety of configurations, officially licensed from Lode King and Prestige Trailers for American Truck Simulator.

The content of this DLC includes:


    Lode King:
  • 3 Flatbed Trailers (Brilliance Flatbed, Forceline Flatbed, and Renown Flatbed)
  • 3 Dropdeck Trailers (Brilliance Dropdeck, Forceline Dropdeck and Renown Dropdeck)
  • 2 Grainhopper (Distinction Aluminum Hopper and Prestige Steel Hopper)

    Prestige:
  • 3 Flatbed Trailers (Brilliance Flatbed, Forceline Flatbed, and Renown Flatbed)
  • 3 Dropdeck Trailers (Brilliance Dropdeck, Forceline Dropdeck and Renown Dropdeck)
  • 1 Grainhopper (Distinction Aluminum Hopper)

These high-quality trailers come with a lot of available customization options and change-able parts such as chassis, markers, bumpers, fender, mudflaps, and bodies.
detailed_description:
Lode King Industries is a Canadian trailer manufacturer that produces extremely popular and reliable vehicles. Since its founding, the company has become one of the most important manufacturers of commercial highway transport trailers. The company has also expanded its production to the states, where they've established as the brand Prestige with which they offer their amazing products specially adjusted for the US market and customers.

We are happy to introduce a total of 15 highly detailed trailer models and compatible accessories, available in a wide variety of configurations, officially licensed from Lode King and Prestige Trailers for American Truck Simulator.

The content of this DLC includes:


    Lode King:
  • 3 Flatbed Trailers (Brilliance Flatbed, Forceline Flatbed, and Renown Flatbed)
  • 3 Dropdeck Trailers (Brilliance Dropdeck, Forceline Dropdeck and Renown Dropdeck)
  • 2 Grainhopper (Distinction Aluminum Hopper and Prestige Steel Hopper)

    Prestige:
  • 3 Flatbed Trailers (Brilliance Flatbed, Forceline Flatbed, and Renown Flatbed)
  • 3 Dropdeck Trailers (Brilliance Dropdeck, Forceline Dropdeck and Renown Dropdeck)
  • 1 Grainhopper (Distinction Aluminum Hopper)

These high-quality trailers come with a lot of available customization options and change-able parts such as chassis, markers, bumpers, fender, mudflaps, and bodies.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
